post_title: FS: Ungraded T206 [9.5.2024] NO LONGER FOR SALE
post_content:
Available for sale are the following cards:

PORTRAITS:

T206 - Ed Killian [Piedmont 350/25] - 
T206 - Moose Grimshaw [Polar Bear] - 
T206 - Rube Dessau [Polar Bear] - SOLD

ACTION POSES:

T206 - John Hummel [Sweet Caporal 350-460/42] - 
T206 - Jim Delehanty [Sweet Caporal 150/649] - 
T206 - Art Fromme [Piedmont 350/25] - 
T206 - Harry Gasper [Piedmont 350/25] - 
T206 - Harry Howell [Piedmont 350-460/25] - 
T206 - Bob Groom [Polar Bear] - 
T206 - George Hunter [Piedmont 350/25] - 
T206 - Jack Dunn [Piedmont 350/25] - 
T206 - Cecil Ferguson [Polar Bear] - 

Please add $5 for shipping.

If you want to purchase any card:

1. The first person to post "I'll take it" will get the card. This post will secure the card in front of anyone else who may be in communication with me regarding that card.
2. Email me at [url]jmanners51@gmail.com[/url] by putting the name of the card in the subject line and your address in the text.
3. Remit payment by PayPal (PPFF).
4. I don't have easy access to a Post Office so please allow up to 5 days for me to get to the Post Office to mail the card.

post_title: 1917 Joe Jackson Standard Biscuit #82 PSA VG 3 POP 1
post_content:
Did you see this card that they are selling on Ebay a 
1917 Standard Biscuit Joe Jackson  #82 very rare.
Will Stern with CLLCT wrote a story on the card. Pretty amazing story. See the article below.

[url]https://l.instagram.com/?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cllct.com%2Fsports-collectibles%2Fsports-cards%2Frare-shoeless-joe-jackson-card-found-in-book-rescued-from-trash&e=AT36Dooa4C6z3BA4YUXlhI76Vb_v3pYCA-5zsSXYXu_eqh3csYl6cXdESFt7b_CDQS8vJTSZGSfmDMB3Tc5m4f5v-Cn6UsHq8eFyOA[/url]
